Posted By: Steve M.
Offered for sale or trade is the following Jack Dempsey N174 Old Judge Boxing card. Still affixed to scrapbook. I'll let the new owner handle removal. (No matter how much I read about removal I still don't personally feel comfortable doing it...my loss, your gain.

$175.00 delivered or trade for similarly conditioned N172.

email with scan of offered trade, if applicable, to jacklitsch@comcast.net

CARD HAS BEEN SNAGGED.
